column2: 取り組む/to include something so that it forms a part of something  incorporate something The new car design incorporates all the latest safety features.  incorporate something in/into/within something We have incorporated all the latest safety features into the design. Many of your suggestions have been incorporated in the plan.
取り巻く、包含する / to include a large number or range of things OR to surround or cover something completely
収集、集団 / the act of putting together different items, amounts, etc. into a single group or total; the group that is formed
a person who believes that it is not possible to know whether God exists or not
意味の / connected with the meaning of words and sentences    ex.) semantic analysis
